rules.content: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may pay {r} to exile a red nonland card from your hand. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and they cost {r} (or {1}) less to cast.
As long as ~ is accompanied by an instant or sorcery card, it has haste and flying.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery card from exile, this creature gets +2/+0 until end{lns}of turn.
